Summary: Noticed flying craft with no naviagation lights but with only single light.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Plymouth
There were no other sightings in Plymouth on or around June 26th 2005
divs: sighting detailsi was driving west on rt. 25 (tenney mt. hwy.), just before the plymouth\rumney town line. to the north i noticed a light in the air that seemed to flicker. then i noticed a craft which seemed dark and that only had a single light on it. there were no normal navigational lights that you would find on an airplane. object was travelling east. these lights were just north of plymouth and rumney, east of stinson mt. the second object that was travelling east was going as fast as a jet or perhaps as fast as a high-performance prop aircraft (400 knots plus). i am reporting this because it seemed unusual to me. it isn't every day you see a flickering light in the sky and then a craft which seems dark and with only a single light. i am a little afraid of ufos so i didn't stick around to observe more.
